item.title: Minecraft Server Pentesting
item.description: Run a Server link # Create the screen session screen -C <session_name> # Reattach to the session screen -r <session_name> Commands in the Server link # Print usage help

item.title: WebAssembly Games Hacking
item.description: Tools link Cetus A browser extension for hacking WebAssembly games. To use it, open developer tool in Chrome or Firefox, and select Cetus tab. Guess the Random Number link First off, try manually input the guessing number. Maybe you will fault then copy the result. Open developer tool and Cetus, in Search panel, paste the number in the Value form. Select “EQ (equal)”, and Value Type, Only Aligned Address?(“yes”). Click “Search” button.

item.title: Chess Game Cheating
item.description: FEN Manipulation linkForsyth-Edwards Notation (FEN) is a standard notation for describing a particular position of a chess game. The file format is .fen. The FEN Generator allows us to create a custom FEN string. For example, below is that our all staffs are queens except the king, and that of the enemy are pawns except the king. pppkpppp/pppppppp/8/8/8/8/QQQQQQQQ/QQQQKQQQ # or ppppkppp/pppppppp/8/8/8/8/QQQQQQQQ/QQQQKQQQ w KQkq - 0 1 Then paste the FEN string to .
